channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Deportation Rationale
item.description: We cover President Trump’s immigration crackdown.

item.title: Russia and China hitting Western democracies with ‘massive digital arsenals’ says EU
item.description: "We must not underestimate the power that this has over us, or the intentions of those behind it."

item.title: Israel Resumes Attacks in Gaza After Stalled Cease-Fire Talks with Hamas
item.description: While Israel has stopped short of a ground invasion for now, its new strikes in Gaza seem to be an effort to force concessions from Hamas.

item.title: U.K. business minister flies to Washington urging Trump to spare Britain from steel import tariffs
item.description: U.K. business minister flies to Washington urging Trump to spare Britain from steel import tariffs

item.title: German auto woes deepen: Audi to cut 7,500 jobs by 2029 amid rising Chinese competition and EV slowdown
item.description: Audi will cut 7,500 jobs in Germany by 2029, blaming weak EV demand and Chinese competition, while investing €8 billion in its home factories.
